source: TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_SEQ_00<tab>Dadanen would like you to deliver a message to Copperbell Mines.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_SEQ_00<tab>ホライズンの商人ダダネンは、カッパーベル銅山に使いを出したいようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_SEQ_01<tab>Dadanen has yet to receive a delivery from Copperbell Mines, and his patience is wearing thin. Deliver his notice to Drunken Stag, the miner whom he hired to deliver his product.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_SEQ_01<tab>カッパーベル銅山からダダネンの元に鉱石が届かないらしい。「カッパーベル銅山」の「ドランケン・スタグ」に「ダダネンからの督促状」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_SEQ_02<tab>Drunken Stag is powerless to act, as the mines have been closed due to an incident in the depths. However, he did mention losing a haul not far from here...
target: TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_SEQ_02<tab>ダダネンからの督促状を渡した。しかし銅山に業務停止命令が出ているため、ダダネンには当分「ブツ」とやらは納品されないだろう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_TODO_00<tab>Deliver Dadanen's final notice to Drunken Stag.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_TODO_00<tab>カッパーベル銅山のドランケン・スタグにダダネンからの督促状を渡す

source: TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_DADANEN_000<tab>It so happens that I've a situation that must be resolved posthaste─and I do mean <var 1A 02 /var>posthaste<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_DADANEN_000)) (( )) 02 /var>！　わざわざモモディに頼んで、
お前をここに呼んだのは他でもない。
大至急「カッパーベル銅山」まで行ってくれないか？

source: TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_DADANEN_001<tab>I'm plumb out of premium product, and my latest order has yet to arrive! If I keep my customers waiting any longer, this could irrevocably damage my reputation!
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_DADANEN_001俺は原石の買いつけにきた宝石商なんだが、
送られてくるはずの「ブツ」について、
銅山から全然連絡がないんだ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_DADANEN_002<tab>What's worse, I paid my man in advance for his services. Despite his assurances that it would be a simple affair, I've heard nothing since he departed for Copperbell Mines days ago.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_DADANEN_002高い手付金を払ったのに……このままじゃ大損だ。
せっかくここまで来た、お前の苦労も無駄足になるぞ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_DADANEN_003<tab>Find Drunken Stag and give him this notice. I cannot afford any further delay.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_DADANEN_003「カッパーベル銅山」の「ドランケン・スタグ」に
この「ダダネンからの督促状」を叩きつけて、
さっさと納品するよう言ってきてくれ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_DRUNKENSTAG_010<tab>What do you want? Hm? Dadanen's product?
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_DRUNKENSTAG_010ああ？　ドランケン・スタグは俺だ。
冒険者が何の用だ？

source: TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_DRUNKENSTAG_011<tab>He can send all the notices he likes, but it won't change a thing.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_DRUNKENSTAG_011督促状……ああ、ダダネンさんか！
実は坑道で恐ろしい魔物が出たとかで
お上から銅山に業務停止命令が出ちまったんだ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_DRUNKENSTAG_012<tab>The Concern has closed the mines due to some incident in the depths.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_DRUNKENSTAG_012「ブツ」が欲しいも何も、
掘りに行けないんじゃどうしようもねえよ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_DRUNKENSTAG_013<tab>It's a godsdamned shame too─lost a decent haul just over yonder during all the chaos...
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL080_00328_DRUNKENSTAG_013仕事にならねえから、
俺たちだって商売あがったりだぜ！
